Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Malibu in 1972...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/18/1983 to a 5-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Halifax on 10/22/1984...
